verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH1961> on the eighth<WH8066> day,<WH3117> that Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> and the elders<WH2205> of Israel;<WH3478>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> Aaron,<WH175> Take<WH3947> thee a young<WH1121> <WH1241> calf<WH5695> for a sin offering,<WH2403> and a ram<WH352> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> without blemish,<WH8549> and offer<WH7126> them before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>

And unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> thou shalt speak,<WH1696> saying,<WH559> Take<WH3947> ye a kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering;<WH2403> and a calf<WH5695> and a lamb,<WH3532> both of the first<WH1121> year,<WH8141> without blemish,<WH8549> for a burnt offering;<WH5930>

Also a bullock<WH7794> and a ram<WH352> for peace offerings,<WH8002> to sacrifice<WH2076> before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> and a meat offering<WH4503> mingled<WH1101> with oil:<WH8081> for<WH3588> today<WH3117> the LORD<WH3068> will appear<WH7200> unto<WH413> you.

And they brought<WH3947> <WH853> that which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> before<WH413> <WH6440> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation:<WH4150> and all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> drew near<WH7126> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>

And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> This<WH2088> is the thing<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> that ye should do:<WH6213> and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> shall appear<WH7200> unto<WH413> you.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Aaron,<WH175> Go<WH7126> unto<WH413> the altar,<WH4196> and offer<WH6213> <WH853> thy sin offering,<WH2403> and thy burnt offering,<WH5930> and make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH1157> thyself, and for<WH1157> the people:<WH5971> and offer<WH6213> <WH853> the offering<WH7133> of the people,<WH5971> and make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH1157> them; as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded.<WH6680>
Aaron <WH175> therefore went<WH7126> unto<WH413> the altar,<WH4196> and slew<WH7819> <WH853> the calf<WH5695> of the sin offering,<WH2403> which<WH834> was for himself.

And the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> brought<WH7126> <WH853> the blood<WH1818> unto<WH413> him: and he dipped<WH2881> his finger<WH676> in the blood,<WH1818> and put<WH5414> it upon<WH5921> the horns<WH7161> of the altar,<WH4196> and poured out<WH3332> the blood<WH1818> at<WH413> the bottom<WH3247> of the altar: <WH4196>

But the fat,<WH2459> and the kidneys,<WH3629> and the caul<WH3508> above<WH4480> the liver<WH3516> of<WH4480> the sin offering,<WH2403> he burnt<WH6999> upon the altar;<WH4196> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses.<WH4872>
And the flesh<WH1320> and the hide<WH5785> he burnt<WH8313> with fire<WH784> without<WH4480> <WH2351> the camp.<WH4264>

And he slew<WH7819> <WH853> the burnt offering;<WH5930> and Aaron's<WH175> sons<WH1121> presented<WH4672> unto<WH413> him<WH853> the blood,<WH1818> which he sprinkled<WH2236> round about<WH5439> upon<WH5921> the altar.<WH4196>
And they presented<WH4672> the burnt offering<WH5930> unto<WH413> him, with the pieces<WH5409> thereof, and the head:<WH7218> and he burnt<WH6999> them upon<WH5921> the altar.<WH4196>
And he did wash<WH7364> <WH853> the inwards<WH7130> and the legs,<WH3767> and burnt<WH6999> them upon<WH5921> the burnt offering<WH5930> on the altar.<WH4196>

And he brought<WH7126> <WH853> the people's<WH5971> offering,<WH7133> and took<WH3947> <WH853> the goat,<WH8163> which<WH834> was the sin offering<WH2403> for the people,<WH5971> and slew<WH7819> it, and offered it for sin,<WH2398> as the first.<WH7223>
And he brought<WH7126> <WH853> the burnt offering,<WH5930> and offered<WH6213> it according to the manner.<WH4941>

And he brought<WH7126> <WH853> the meat offering,<WH4503> and took a handful<WH4390> <WH3709> thereof,<WH4480> and burnt<WH6999> it upon<WH5921> the altar,<WH4196> beside<WH4480> <WH905> the burnt sacrifice<WH5930> of the morning.<WH1242>

He slew<WH7819> also<WH853> the bullock<WH7794> and the ram<WH352> for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings,<WH8002> which<WH834> was for the people:<WH5971> and Aaron's<WH175> sons<WH1121> presented<WH4672> unto<WH413> him the blood,<WH1818> which he sprinkled<WH2236> upon<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> round about,<WH5439>

And the fat<WH2459> of<WH4480> the bullock<WH7794> and of<WH4480> the ram,<WH352> the rump,<WH451> and that which covereth<WH4374> the inwards, and the kidneys,<WH3629> and the caul<WH3508> above the liver: <WH3516>
And they put<WH7760> <WH853> the fat<WH2459> upon<WH5921> the breasts,<WH2373> and he burnt<WH6999> the fat<WH2459> upon the altar: <WH4196>
And the breasts<WH2373> and the right<WH3225> shoulder<WH7785> Aaron<WH175> waved<WH5130> for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> as<WH834> Moses<WH4872> commanded.<WH6680>

And Aaron<WH175> lifted up<WH5375> <WH853> his hand<WH3027> toward<WH413> the people,<WH5971> and blessed<WH1288> them, and came down<WH3381> from offering<WH4480> <WH6213> of the sin offering,<WH2403> and the burnt offering,<WH5930> and peace offerings.<WH8002>

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went<WH935> into<WH413> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and came out,<WH3318> and blessed<WH1288> <WH853> the people:<WH5971> and the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the people.<WH5971>

And there came a fire out<WH3318> <WH784> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and consumed<WH398> upon<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> <WH853> the burnt offering<WH5930> and the fat:<WH2459> which when all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> saw,<WH7200> they shouted,<WH7442> and fell<WH5307> on<WH5921> their faces.<WH6440>
